name: The Killer of Dishonor
description:
The Killer of Dishonor - is a hardcore 2D platformer with surviving elements where you will have to fight to ancient evil playing as a hired killer.
This is a linear and really thrilling platformer where you need to set to various trips, fight to different monsters, use magic and, of course, improve the character’s skills. With every new level stronger enemies will be met on the way. Think of every step, buy the best ammo, try to avoid traps and do everything to get the aim successfully!

KEY FEATURES:

• Studying game mechanics at the beginning of the game
• Hardcore gameplay
• Variety of gameplay
• Nice pixel graphics
• Relaxing soundtrack
• Unforgettable impressions
